specialRules.name: Wizard (8)
specialRules.description: This Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation with 8 dice.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (14")
specialRules.description: This Character contributes 3 Shots when performing a Volley Action with 14" range.

specialRules.name: Wizard (7)
specialRules.description: This Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation with 7 dice.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Wizard (7)
specialRules.description: This Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation with 7 dice.

specialRules.name: Forward Force
specialRules.description: The non-Monster Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached to gains the Flank Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1.

specialRules.name: Flawless Strikes
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, all Hit Rolls of "1" count the Target's Defense as 0 for that Attack.

drawEvents.name: Elemental Assault
drawEvents.description: The Character may immediately remove 3 Ritual Markers from a Ritual that is currently Being Prepared, to have Target Friendly Regiment within 12" gain either the Untouchable or Relentless Blows Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1.

specialRules.name: Linebreaker
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule ignores the Shield Special Rule and Bastion (X) Draw Event, when performing a Clash or Duel Action, or when resolving Impact Attacks.

specialRules.name: Wizard (1)
specialRules.description: This Regiment can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation with 1 die.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: A command stand containing a leader adds +1 attack to the command stands characteristic profile.

specialRules.description: A regiment with a Standard Bearer gains the unstoppable special rule.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 3.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (3)
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +3 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1 for the purposes of making Morale Tests.

specialRules.name: Untouchable
specialRules.description: This Regiment Re-Rolls failed Defense Rolls of "6".

specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 5 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action with 18" range.

specialRules.name: Arcing Fire
specialRules.description: Until the end of this Regiment's Activation, if the Regiment has the Aimed Shot Special Rule and is not currently occupying a piece of Garrison terrain, instead of performing a Volley Action as normal it may perform special arcing fire.

specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.
